price: 112. Allah zal zeggen: “Hoeveel jaren brachten jullie door op aarde" [1]?
arabic: قَٰلَ كَمۡ لَبِثۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ
footnotes: [1]Waarvan sommige op aarde en andere in jullie graven.

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qāla kam labith'tum fī al-arḍi ʿadada sinīna
